text: The Mayor shall include in the Affordable Housing Inventory an affordable housing development that does not receive financing, subsidy, funding, or some form of financial assistance from the District of Columbia or federal government to provide a unit of affordable housing, if the affordable housing development requests inclusion in the Affordable Housing Inventory and submits the information required by ยง 42-2135 to the Mayor, or the Mayor's designee, on a quarterly basis.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-215, see notes following ยง 42-2131.

DC CODE ยง 42-2134

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Submission of affordable housing data by affordable housing developments.
